properties.name: LoadBalancerName
properties.description: The name of your load balancer.

type.description: The name of your load balancer.

properties.name: CertificateDomainName
properties.description: The domain name (e.g., example.com ) for your SSL/TLS certificate.

type.description: The domain name (e.g., example.com ) for your SSL/TLS certificate.

properties.name: CertificateAlternativeNames
properties.description: An array of strings listing alternative domains and subdomains for your SSL/TLS certificate.

type.description: An array of strings listing alternative domains and subdomains for your SSL/TLS certificate.

properties.name: IsAttached
properties.description: When true, the SSL/TLS certificate is attached to the Lightsail load balancer.

type.description: When true, the SSL/TLS certificate is attached to the Lightsail load balancer.

properties.name: HttpsRedirectionEnabled
properties.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether HTTPS redirection is enabled for the load balancer.

type.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether HTTPS redirection is enabled for the load balancer.

properties.name: Status
properties.description: The validation status of the SSL/TLS certificate.

type.description: The validation status of the SSL/TLS certificate.
